begining.name: Finding Reason
begining.synopsis: You have landed in the earth solar system and are just awaken from stasis and need to find the reason for you being there.

the_stop.name: The Stop
the_stop.objective: Sit back and enjoy the cutscene.

reach_infirmary.name: Reach the infirmary
reach_infirmary.objective: Make your way through the ship towards the infirmary.
